title: Ticket #6769: cannot clone HTCondor repo on macOS with Sophos anti-virus installed
description:
The file src/condor_tests/appendmsg.exe is identified by Sophos as a threat of type Mal/Generic-S and automatically deleted upon cloning the repo.

You may elect to view this as an issue or not, but the practical impact is to cause git to think I've made a change to the repo because it detects a deleted file.
remarks:
